p: To assess the performance of our semi-nested RT-PCR assay with human clinical specimens, a total of 192 swab samples from patients with pneumonia were tested. Of these, nine (4.7 %) tested positive with the expected amplicon size (Table S4). Upon sequencing, four specimens had evidence of HCoVâˆ’OC43, four had evidence of canine-CoV, and one (1) had evidence of HCoV-NL63.
